overview: Beth manages Enspire’s leadership development programs. She leads implementation and delivery of our Executive Challenge programs for executives at Fortune 500 Companies and top-tier business schools. Prior to coming to Enspire, Beth worked in energy finance for Enron Corp. and Constellation Energy. She holds an M.B.A. from Duke University and graduated from the Liberal Arts Honors program at the University of Texas at Austin. She speaks Spanish fluently and is an avid international traveler.
